EmailTemplate.subject: Overdue Reminder - Do Not Respond
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.FirstName},
Attached is a copy of your current Parts Statement.
This email is a friendly reminder that payment on your account with us appears past due.
Any questions you may have should be directed to the Dealer Department at Legend Boats by clicking here dealeradmin@legendboats.com or calling a1-888-345-4756. Please do not respond to this email.
In order to avoid any delays on your part orders, please forward a payment at your earliest possible convenience. We also wish to advise that late fees may be applied on balances outstanding past the 15th of the month.
Payments can be made on your Legend Boats account using the following methods:
Interac e-Transfers can be directed to accounting@legendboats.com Electronic transfer of funds or wire transfer
Bank # 003 (Royal Bank of Canada) Transit # 04982 Account # 103 111 1
By cheque sent to 4795 Regional Road 55, Whitefish, Ontario
If your payment has already been mailed, please accept our thanks and disregard this reminder.
Thank you and have a great day.
